tweets.text: Day 1 of reducing plastic at Christmas - why not reuse your decorations from last year? üéÑ The average household spends ¬£185 on decorations each year - save money and the planet too! üåç @EnvAgency https://t.co/7cQUytZZk4

"Be in no doubt that anything less than a prosecution and full restoration of the river, paid for by the perpetrator, will be acceptable‚Äù.

@EnvAgency and others want to prove they are fit for the 21st century? Here's your chance. https://t.co/ji0wmcYyhf

@jane_studio @DaveThroupEA @EnvAgency @NaturalEngland @ForestryComm @WMerciaPolice @HfdsCouncil Everywhere is private land around there. (Doesn't give them the right to tear up a national site though)

A mile of the River Lugg has been bulldozed to destruction.
Bankside trees grubbed out & burnt.
Riverbed scraped out.
Meanders reprofiled.
Disaster for downstream wildlife.
This was an SSSI.
No consent was sought. 
@EnvAgency must surely prosecute this.
RT
https://t.co/cSBhrR2nDW

We're mounting a wide-ranging investigation into reports of damage to the #RiverLugg, which is protected through SSSI status. We're treating this very seriously, working with @NaturalEngland & @ForestryComm who have taken immediate action to prevent any further works at the site. https://t.co/bvhnTETfal

Knowing just one action to take can reduce the effects on your home and family.

üëâLearn what to do in a flood:
https://t.co/a9sZgdRGHP

#PrepareActSurvive https://t.co/xVcBCHQhwT

tweets.text: @DaveThroupEA @MattEAShardlow @EnvAgency @NaturalEngland @ForestryComm @WMerciaPolice @HfdsCouncil Could you have used your powers earlier? Would the correct response in this situation have been to call 999 ?
@DaveThroupEA @EnvAgency @NaturalEngland @ForestryComm @WMerciaPolice @HfdsCouncil The work must have been seen being done, was it not possible to stop it before all this damage was done?

@EnvAgency @NaturalEngland @ForestryComm If this type of blatant destruction (with bulldozer!!) slipped through the net of all the statutory bodies set up precisely to protect such valuable io diverse environment, what other such destruction is passing you by?
@EnvAgency @NaturalEngland @ForestryComm Regulator breaks with its own standard procedures of sleepy indifference after public outcry...

Curiouser and curiouser.

The redoubtable @bettwsresident CEO of @WUFoundation making it very clear  that @EnvAgencyMids were alerted to the destruction that was taking place on the River Lugg last week. 

Did EA the respond? If not why not.

Starts 8:37

https://t.co/XbNCDTpqIL
